params._LPTokenAmount: (uint256) - amount of the ERC-20 LP token to stake in order to participate
params._endTime: (uint256) - block timestamp at which the tournament ends
params._poolIncentivized: (address) - address of the pool to incentivize and from which we will accept the LP token
params._startTime: (uint256) - block timestamp at which the tournament starts

getVrfConfig().details: For use by the proxies when requesting a word to VRF

setChainlinkConfig(bytes32,uint32).details: Gas lanes for each chain can be found here https://docs.chain.link/vrf/v2/subscription/supported-networks

createTournament(string,address,uint256,.notice: Function that allows anyone to deploy a new tournament contract

getAllActiveTournaments().notice: Returns an array of all the active tournament contracts

getAllFutureTournaments().notice: Returns an array of all the future tournament contracts

getAllPastTournaments().notice: Returns an array of all the past tournament contracts

getAllTournaments().notice: Returns an array of all the tournament contracts

getTournamentsByPartner(address).notice: Function that returns an array of all the tournament a partner created

getTournamentsByPlayer(address).notice: Returns an array of all the tournament entered by a player

isTournament(address).notice: Returns true if the contract is a deployed tournament, false otherwise

setChainlinkConfig(bytes32,uint32).notice: Allows the owner to change the chainlink config
